subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Red Sox starter Jon Lester was hit in the right leg by Melky Cabrera’s line drive in the third inning and crumpled to the mound, but the Red Sox later called his injury only a contusion.
snippet: Red Sox starter Jon Lester was hit in the right leg by Melky Cabrera’s line drive in the third inning and crumpled to the mound, but the Red Sox later called his injury only a contusion.
